FuncDef:
The diffie-hellman modulus command sets the modulus of the Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm.
By default, the value Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm modulus is 3072.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the modulus of the Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm.
The value can be 2048, 3072 or 4096.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command can set the modulus of the Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm.
